name: Restart your life Adventures of Tainuote
name_original: Restart your life Adventures of Tainuote
description:
Embark on your adventures in the fantastical land of Tainuote.
The mystical power of tarot will guide you to eradicate evil and darkness after your reincarnation.
To be a great warrior, to increase your strength, to explore the unknown, to give you infinite joy.
A Rougelike turn-based FTB game.

The game is a full roguelike experience, with lots of fun to build, strengthen, explore, and collect
In-game language switch, if necessary, please set in the game
Adventurers! Roll your dice! Let the unknown fantasy adventure begin!


features
Adopt the way of dice movement + slot machine reward, make the adventure full of infinite fun unknown,



The game includes collection, enhancement, building, tower climbing and other Rougelike gameplay.









Combat using FTB turn-based combat mode, with a variety of buffs to enhance combat fun
